# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes
(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$
\.avi$
\.dll$
\.exe$
\.gif$
\.ico$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\..
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.pdb$
\.png$
\.rtf$
\.wav$
^\.github/
^\Qchocolatey.snk\E$
^\Qlib/ILMerge/ILMerge.doc\E$
